PASSES.NO_KIDS: Due to security measures in place, we suggest that do not bring children. We hope that this decision does not prevent us from having your presence.
PASSES.MESSAGE: There are moments in life that are special on their own. Sharing them with the people we cherish makes them magical and unforgettable.

GIFT_TABLE.MESSAGE: Our home is complete, but if you want to give us a gift, add miles to our honeymoon!

ENVELOPE_RAIN.LABEL: Envelope rain
ENVELOPE_RAIN.MESSAGE: Or if you prefer a cash gift, you can do so at our envelope rain table that will be at the event.
